resources.string: Check the governments most recent updates on the pandemic.
Report any corona symptoms you have began to experience

"Thank you for using the Covid-19 contact tracing application. This app will allow you, your friends and family to stay safe during these difficult times through the use of private and secure tracking of the corona virus. \n\n To get started please enter your details below : "

By checking this box you accept the local use of your bluetooth data for corona virus tracking purposes. (THIS IS A TEST AGREEMENT, THIS IS NOT AT ALL AN AUTHENTIC OR LEGAL AGREEMENT AT THIS POINT IN DEVELOPMENT)
Scannable QR code for easy scanning of personal details and status.
